titleStmt.title: The two last dialogues treating of the kingdome of God within us and without us, and of his special providence through Christ over his church from the beginning to the end of all things : whereunto is annexed a brief discourse of the true grounds of the certainty of faith in points of religion, together with some few plain songs of divine hymns on the chief holy-days of the year.
titleStmt.author: More, Henry, 1614-1687.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry More by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
